title: Vaccines and Therapeutics
text: On this earth there are plagues and there are victims, and it’s up to us, as much as possible, not to join forces with the plagues. – Albert Camus, The Plague, 1946

title: About
text:
Dining Dilemnas as is an ongoing, interdisplinary series allowing for informed discussion on complex topics starting in 2012.
The program is directed by Dr. Pat Lord is popular with students pursuing a wide range of majors, and especially those considering careers in healthcare.



Dining Dilemns

title: Oh Cluck! Bird Flu, Vaccines, and the Price of Eggs
text: The price of eggs have been on the rise growing with the cost of a dozen eggs in the United States increasing nearly 288% in price from August 2023 to February 2025! This rapid increase in the cost of eggs has outpaced inflation and begs the question: what’s causing this???
